# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

The Mailrify Python SDK is currently in pre-release. Security updates will be provided for the latest published version on PyPI.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please email `security@mailrify.com` with the details. For coordinated disclosure:

- Provide a clear description of the issue, steps to reproduce, and any potential impact.
- Allow us at least 90 days to investigate, patch, and release a fix before public disclosure.
- Do not share sensitive information or exploit the vulnerability beyond what is necessary for proof of concept.

We will acknowledge receipt of your report within 5 business days and keep you updated on remediation progress.

Thank you for helping to keep Mailrify and its users secure.
